• Adopted the inner frame system "The Advanced MS Joint."

  • The finely color-coded parts can express the shades without painting.

  • Includes various marking stickers.
  • The Japanese sword "Gerbera Straight" is silver color plated. The pattern on the blade is also reproduced.

misc_info:
• Strike Freedom Gundam joins the RG series of MS Gundam SEED which has already launched Aile Strike Gundam, Freedom Gundam, Justice Gundam and Destiny Gundam.
  • Plated parts are applied for the inside of the wings.
  • Easy assembling and wide range of motion are achieved by advanced MS joints.
  • Pursues the reality by the thorough study on Strike Freedom. The spreading and folding gimmicks of the weapon wings are designed based on the concept of actual machine settings.
  • Realistic decals add reality on the texture as if it were made of real metals.
  • The gold frames, one of the characteristics of Strike Freedom Gundam, are re-created by molded color.
  • The beam shield is re-created by a clear material.
  • The long-range beam rifle can be re-created by connecting two beam rifles.
  • Runner x8, Realistic decal x1, Instruction manual x1

// Product Detail //

• Aile Strike Gundam joins in the RG series as the third model of the new series in celebration of the Gunpla 30th anniversary.
  • The "Advanced MS joints" system improves the kit’s movable performance.
  • The "Realistic Decal" feature gives the details metal texture for extra realism.
  • Multi colored outer parts develop the model’s appeal.
  • Includes 1/144 figures of Kira Yamato standing and sitting.

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• As the second model of new series celebrating of the Gunpla 30th anniversary, Char’s Zaku appears with the "Real System."
  • The design is created on the assumption of 1/1 scale.
  • Adopted the "Advanced MS joints" which have new assembling process of inner structure.
  • The "Realistic Decal" system has luster like metal which is difficult to express by paint.
  • The color coding is excellent compared to any other 1/144 scale model.
  • The "Advanced MS joints" are designed to recreate the astounding movements of Char's Zaku. They have the widest range of movement in the history of Gunpla.
  • By the adoption of “Touch gate,” the pipes are easily assembled.

misc_info:
• A new series, REAL GRADE (RG), rolls out in July 2010. This is a new brand of plastic model kit that pursues realistic representation with the latest technology for all those who know Gundam. A highly detailed model that has dynamic action and gimmicks. A pre-constructed inner frame makes assembly stress-free.
  • All the features of the RX-78-2 Gundam are consolidated into the 125mm tall body.
  • Having an inner frame with the "Advanced MS Joint" makes it possible to move dynamically with fewer parts.
  • Comes with the "Realistic Decal" feature that pursues reality with special decal material.
  • 10 Runners, 1 Realistic decal sheet, Instruction manual

  • With the swap of a few parts like its shoulders, you can recreate its Dragon Mode!
  • Combine its weapons into a greatbow, and stand it on an included clear yellow stand!
  • A webcomic celebrating 400 releases is available now on Bandai Hobby Site’s BB Senshi page.

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info: Under the supervision of its original designer, Kanetake Ebikawa, the 00 Gundam is re-introduced to the Perfect Grade line with new parts in the head, legs, and shoulders that refine its body proportion in addition to new weapons! Designed as an alternate equipment loadout, the Seven Sword/G equipment features 7 GN blade themed weapons and 1 blaster: GN Buster Sword II, GN Sword II Long and Short blades, 2 GN Katars, 2 GN Beam Sabers, and the GN Sword II Blaster each with displayable gimmicks The GN Buster Sword II can convert between shield and sword forms and features LED gimmicks. GN Sword II Blaster when fully assembled, measures over a foot long (13.38”)! GN Katars can be mounted on knees and also held in hands. Both GN Sword II can convert between sword and rifle modes, and a wire is included to replicate the rocket anchor ability of the Short sword.

Flying down to the battlefield with Setsuna, F · Seiei who was awakened by Innovator as a body equipped with seven swords and guns. In addition to arming, new modeling parts are also added to the main body. The aircraft that was active in "Mobile Suit Gundam 00V Senki" is kitized with PG!
Refined proportions, renewed coloring and texture expression.

• Adjust proportions of each part such as legs, head and shoulder. By new modeling parts, make it more refined impression.
  • Adopt molding material that emphasizes texture. Under the supervision of Ebi Ekawa Kanitake, the molding color is completely renewed.
  • Armed parts cover variable light gimmicks
  • GN Bustor Sword II reproduces the light gimmick by LED.
  • Newly developed light guiding parts of the new mechanism (patent pending) by understanding the setting shape and performing detailed light guidance analysis and design
  • Large Armed GN Sword II Blaster is reproduced in a large size of about 340 mm in total length.
  • GN Qatar can reproduce various variations such as mount to the leg part by itself, connected state and so on.
  • GN Sword II Long / Short form can be reproduced by replacing, Long rifle in rifle state, Short can be reproduced using lead wire injection mode.
[INCLUDED ACCESSORIES] GN Buster Sword II × 1, GN Sword II Short × 1, GN Sword II Long × 1, GN Qatar × 2, GN beam sabel × 2, GN Sword II Blaster × 1, Action base × 1

[CONTENTS] Runner × 44, foil seal × 1, Marking seal × 1, Dry decal × 1, GN drive × 2, LED unit × 2, Hexagon bolt × 2, Screw (long) × 4 (short) × 2, Hexagon nut (large) × 2 (small) × 6, Coil spring × 8, Rubber seal × 2, PE sheet 2 types × 1 each, Bis × 1, Lead wire × 1, Instruction manual x 1

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• After four years of secret development, the PG Gundam Astray Red Frame makes its big debut!
  • In keeping with the "Red Frame" designation, the movable frame around which the Perfect Grade series is designed is molded in red, with a completely articulated structure for exciting and flexible posing!
  • Shoulder units can extended outwards for expanded range of movement.
  • Elbows feature multi-joint construction which allows complex poses, such as drawing the sword.
  • Stomach unit features full articulation, including "hydraulic" cylinders.
  • Knee armor designed to move along with poses.
  • Calf frame extends and retracts.
  • Battery-powered light-emitting diode (LED) system can be switched on to illuminate the eyes.
  • The Red Frame's trademark weapon, the "Gerbera Straight" long sword, features separate blade, guard, and pommel construction just like a real sword!
  • Blade portion is chromed plastic for a realistic finish, and features engraving on the lower part of the blade.
  • Guard and pommel-end are gold chromed plastic with detailed sculpting.
  • Blade is designed so as to be fastened in the pommel with rivets.
  • The scabbard for the Gerbera Straight incorporates a newly designed suspension unit for connection to the body.
  • Additional accessories include a beam rifle with accurate internal detail; a shield with actual direct-view shutter feature; and two beam sabers.
  • Includes instruction manual, mechanical description, and an original comic drawn by artist Koichi Tokita.

misc_info: The GM Sniper II, the Scarlet Team's elite mobile suit, has now launched in the MG line-up! The model kit incorporates a new waist-mobility gimmick that enables it to smoothly recreate a sniping pose. In addition to this, the range of movement in the shoulder has been increased, allowing the model kit ease of movement. The sensor part has been recreated using clear parts and the visor can also be opened or closed. New designs have been used to create the Mobile Suit's weapons and accessories. A right hand part with a cocked finger is included to add realism to the Sniper Rifle pose.

Set includes Sniper rifle x1, Bullpup machine gun x1, shield x1, beam saber x2, machine gun magazines x3, gun-wielding hand (right) x1, clenched hand (left and right) x1 each, clenched hand for weapons (left and right) x1 each, open hand (left and right) x1 each, and pilot figurine x1. Runner x16. Foil sticker x1. Marking sticker x1. Instruction manual x1.

Parts：MS CAGE
劇中に登場するMSケージをプラモデルオリジナルデザインで再現。ユニコーンガンダムや武装類を格納することが可能。
Parts：PSYCHO-FRAME
サイコフレームは集光樹脂を使用して発光イメージを再現。
Parts：WAIST
腰部は新造パーツにより回転域が拡大。
Parts：LOCK
デストロイモード時の腰部装甲にロック機構を採用。
Parts：KNEE
膝関節はパーツを改良することで可動域を拡大。
Parts：STORAGE SPACE
背面には収納BOXが付属し、小さなパーツや余った差し換え用のパーツなどを保管しておくことができる。装備類もケージ背面の固定ラックに取り付けて保管しておくことができる。
Parts：ARM
コックピットハッチの開閉に対応したアーム形状も再現。
アームの根元にはPCパーツを内蔵しフレキシブルな動きが可能。ユニコーンガンダム収納時には、キット本体にフィットさせることで安定した格納状態を維持できる。
Parts：ACTION BASE
MSケージに「バンダイプラモデルアクションベース1」（別売り）の一部パーツを取り付けることで劇中さながらの演出でディスプレイができる。
Parts：WEAPONS
ビーム・マグナムやハイパー・バズーカなど、ユニコーンガンダムの代表的な各種装備が付属。
Parts：MARKING
マーキングシールは設定内に多く見られる絵柄を元にプラモデルオリジナルマークとしてセット。MSケージにも使用できる専用マーキングを付属。
Parts：FOOT
足の装甲にも展開ギミックを内蔵。ヒール部分が回転しながら展開し脚部、腹部の伸縮とあいまって身長が大きく変化する。
Parts：MARKING
マーキングシールは設定内に多く見られる絵柄を元にプラモデルオリジナルマークとしてセット。
Parts：BACKPACK
変身ギミックに合わせてビーム・サーベルを起こし、サイドのカバーが展開することで、ノズルが出現。デストロイモードのサイズに合わせたバランスで構成。
 
Parts：FIGURE
1/100スケール、バナージ・リンクス（ノーマルスーツ立ち、座り）以外に、ＨＤカラーオリジナルのバナージ・リンクス（私服）、オードリー・バーン、マリーダ・クルス、カーディアス・ビストのフィギュアが付属。
  
Parts：HEAD
頭部はユニコーンモードからフェイスガードが出現。ブレードアンテナが展開し、デストロイモードへ。アニメ設定で追加された頭部バルカン砲を再現。

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• "Origin of Memory" recreated by world-class industrial designer Kiyoyuki Okuyama x director / film director Hen Matsuo
  • A special Gundam that will color the 2019 Gundam 40th Anniversary and the 2020 Gundam 40th Anniversary!
  • Pursuing a structure with reality while being particular about human form and movement. The 18m MS is verified through 3D design through the same design production process as a normal industrial product.
  • The movable range and joint structure of the limbs are constructed based on realistic industrial design.
  • The image of the main camera on the head moving in a line, expressed with a foil sticker.
  • In addition to the movable legs, the legs are also designed with emphasis on the silhouette. Recalls a supple jump.
  • The arm joints are conscious of the human skeleton. Assuming close combat, joints are added to the forearm to create a line that makes you feel more human.
  • In the twisting and stretching movements of the abdomen, it is more movable than the human body. Expresses the movement that combines human movement and Gundam design.
  • The outline of the whole body is three-dimensional and gentle. Expresses a characteristic body line that makes you feel the future.
  • Accessories: Beam saber × 2, Beam rifle × 1, Shield x1

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info: The fourth installment of the “Gunpla Evolution Project” is the HGAC 1/144 Leo from “Gundam Wing”! The Leo is a mass-produced MS named after the “Leo” constellation. Emphasis has been placed on this kit’s ease of assembly, making it easier for fans to collect and build multiple kits! The new joint structuring on this kit allows for a wide range of articulation and shortens the time required for assembly. The joints can also be fitted later, making the process easier for those who enjoy customizing and painting their kits. The arrangement of the runners have also been reorganized by grouping the parts together to aide in an easy visualization of the kit’s construction such as “leg parts” or “arm parts” in proximity of each other. In addition to ease of assembly, the HG 1/144 Leo also recreates designs and precise details that have been added to this new format such as the usage of clear parts instead of stickers on the main camera on the head. A drum gun, beam sabers, and shield and included and can be stored I the back of the shield. Combine this with other HGAC kits such as the “HGAC 1/144 Wing Gundam” (BAN183663)! Set includes Drum Gun x1, Beam saber x2, and Shield x1. Runner x1. Instruction manual x1.

• The kit has been designed from the ground up for ease of assembly and incredible detail!
  • Runner composition has been optimized to allow for simple and straightforward step-by-step construction
  • Precise details have been recreated in the mold, meaning no stickers are necessary. 6 colors have been recreated on the runners alone!
  • Beam saber hilts can be stored inside the shield. The structure of the drum gun allows it to be held in both hands.
